parent_issue.title: Add dark mode support to settings page
parent_issue.body:
## Description

Users have requested the ability to switch to dark mode in the application settings.

## Priority

Medium

## Requirements

- Add toggle in settings
- Persist preference
- Apply theme across app

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Settings page has dark mode toggle
- [ ] Preference is saved
- [ ] Theme applies correctly
